We want the army to be strong and to arm it with new and sophisticated weapons, and no one should tell us that some weapons are forbidden to us. Nothing is forbidden to us.
The House of Representatives must meet soon and approve the program law so that @LebaneseArmy will be armed
The political cover of the army is 100 percent complete without reservation
The army can only have the whole nation and its loyalty to the unified political authority and not to the political divide, and the president must be representative of this national will
Unfortunately, political cover also exists for perpetrators, and politicians cover the perpetrators secretly
A defensive strategy to take advantage of the resistance and neutralize the political divisions, and sought to fulfill all the army's responsibilities and supported by the resistance when he needs
This is the perception of our progress and discussed in the dialogue, and talked about the subject in the speech section, to benefit from the resistance and the use of weapons inside the Lebanese
We have entered into the Syrian vortex without thinking about the interests of the nation, and we have overcome the unrest and there is no need to obstruct or delay the ministerial statement
It can not be said that the entitlement will not be obtained and no political party to boycott the elections and they must participate in the voting sessions to reach the election of a president
Presidential elections must take place at all costs
The postponement of the parliamentary elections was not good, at a time when the surrounding countries are moving to democracy, and parliamentary elections must be held in October at any price
